Name: CiscoACI
Author: Ruchita Dubey - v-rucdu@microsoft.com
Description: [Cisco Application Centric Infrastructure (ACI)](https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/solutions/collateral/data-center-virtualization/application-centric-infrastructure/solution-overview-c22-741487.html) data connector provides the capability to ingest [Cisco ACI logs](https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/switches/datacenter/aci/apic/sw/all/syslog/guide/b_ACI_System_Messages_Guide/m-aci-system-messages-reference.html) into Azure Sentinel.
